game.name: Kiosk 199X
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Run a tiny 90s kiosk in a chaotic Eastern country - Kolkhozland. Serve quirky customers, survive inspections, pick a side in a local power struggle, and uncover a hidden conspiracy - all in a story-driven retro management sim full of humor and choices.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run a tiny 90s kiosk in a chaotic Eastern country - Kolkhozland. Serve quirky customers, survive inspections, pick a side in a local power struggle, and uncover a hidden conspiracy - all in a story-driven retro management sim full of humor and choices.
